title: Tulsi Gabbard Leaves the Warmongering Cabal of Woke Elitists | Daily Best of October 11 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Tulsi Gabbard calls out the Democratic Party for what it truly is. Joe Biden is apparently unable to count to three. NYC Mayor Eric Adams says the influx of immigrants should be handled at the border by the federal government. The small town of Fruithurst, Alabama, makes national news for an unusual spike in cancer cases. Florida is overrun by pythons. Tiffany Cross tries to make a point about racism in the NFL and is wrong on all fronts. And, we encourage people to judge their neighbors by how gory their Halloween decorations are.
